meanings.definition: A device used to measure the alkalinity of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The alkalimeter showed that the water was not acidic.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use an alkalimeter to test the pH level of different solutions.
meanings.sent3: The alkalimeter and the litmus paper had a race to see which could detect alkalinity faster.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an alkalimeter, always indicating the positivity of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The alkalimeter beeped loudly, signaling the high alkalinity of the soil.
